subject.Description: The string identifier of the subject, e.g. LTP123

trial.Description: Word list (1-24) during which the event occurred. Trial <= 0 indicates practice list.

trial_type.Description: Indicator of type of task action that occurs at the marked time

Levels.REC_WORD: Recalled word, onset of speech (during free recall).
Levels.REST_REWET: Mid-session break to rewet scalp cap.

item_name.Description: The word being presented or recalled in a WORD or REC_WORD event.

item_num.Description: The ID number of the presented or recalled word in the word pool. -1 represents an intrusion or vocalization.

answer.Description: Answer to problem with form X + Y + Z = ?

test_x.Description: X component of problem with form X + Y + Z = ?

test_y.Description: Y component of problem with form X + Y + Z = ?

test_z.Description: Z component of problem with form X + Y + Z = ?
